metadata.title: CVE-2025-0239 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: When using Alt-Svc, ALPN did not properly validate certificates when theoriginal server is redirecting to an insecure site. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 134, Firefox ESR < 128.6, Thunderbird < 134, andThunderbird ESR < 128.6.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
